component.name: pxtone Collab
component.summary: Sample-based music editor where you can collaborate with friends!

description.p: Unofficial flatpak package of pxtone Collab

About: pxtone collab (ptcollab) is a sample-based music editor where you can collaborate with friends! It's based off the music engine of pxtone, a music editor developed by Pixel, the creator of Cave Story and Kero Blaster.
Features: ptcollab has many standard features you might expect from a music editor. If you've used pxtone collage before, the following will be familiar:

ul.li: Note and parameter input (pan, volume, portamento, fine-tuning, effects)
Collaborative editing: host a server and have others connect and work with you!
Session recording: save a frame-by-frame recording of a session and play it back later!
MIDI input: Record notes either live while the song is playing, or using keyboard controls to step through time.
